9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Amr bin Dinar narrated from Amr bin Abdulah bin Safwan, that Yazid bin Shaiban said:"Ibn Mirba Al-Ansari came to us while we were standing at our places" (Amr bin Sinar said:) a place that Amr (bin Abdullah) indicated was far - "and he said: 'I am a messenger whom the Messenger of Allah sent to you to say: 'Stay with your (Hajj) rites, for indeed you are following a legacy left by Ibrahim

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُقُوفِ بِعَرَفَاتٍ وَالدُّعَاءِ بِهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Standing At Arafat Supplicating There
